typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> DwhsourceCategory
DwhsourceCategory aggregate(groupBy(Category),
	CategoryX = count(Category)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 alterRow(upsertIf(not(isNull(Category)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		MovieCategorySK as integer,
		MovieCategoryDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['MovieCategoryDescription'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		MovieCategoryDescription = Category
	)) ~> DwhsinkCategory
